00053 uvm_common_schedule* uvm_common_schedule::get_uvm_common_schedule()
00054 {
00055     uvm_phase* pphase;
00056 
00057     if (_uvm_common_schedule == 0)
00058     {
00059         _uvm_common_schedule = new uvm_common_schedule("common");
00060 
00061         pphase = new uvm_build_phase(_uvm_common_schedule);
00062         _uvm_common_schedule->add_phase(pphase);
00063 
00064         pphase = new uvm_connect_phase(_uvm_common_schedule);
00065         _uvm_common_schedule->add_phase(pphase);
00066 
00067         pphase = new uvm_end_of_elaboration_phase(_uvm_common_schedule);
00068         _uvm_common_schedule->add_phase(pphase);
00069 
00070         pphase = new uvm_start_of_simulation_phase(_uvm_common_schedule);
00071         _uvm_common_schedule->add_phase(pphase);
00072 
00073         pphase = new uvm_run_phase(_uvm_common_schedule);
00074         _uvm_common_schedule->add_phase(pphase);
00075 
00076         pphase = new uvm_common_phase("extract", _uvm_common_schedule, UVM_POSTRUN_PHASE, UVM_BOTTOM_UP);
00077         _uvm_common_schedule->add_phase(pphase);
00078 
00079         pphase = new uvm_common_phase("check", _uvm_common_schedule, UVM_POSTRUN_PHASE, UVM_BOTTOM_UP);
00080         _uvm_common_schedule->add_phase(pphase);
00081 
00082         pphase = new uvm_common_phase("report", _uvm_common_schedule, UVM_POSTRUN_PHASE, UVM_BOTTOM_UP);
00083         _uvm_common_schedule->add_phase(pphase);
00084 
00085         pphase = new uvm_common_phase("final", _uvm_common_schedule, UVM_POSTRUN_PHASE, UVM_TOP_DOWN);
00086         _uvm_common_schedule->add_phase(pphase);
00087 
00088         _uvm_common_schedule->set_top_phase("build");
00089         //_uvm_common_schedule->set_top_phase("run");
00090         _uvm_common_schedule->add_arc("build", "connect");
00091         _uvm_common_schedule->add_arc("connect", "end_of_elaboration");
00092         _uvm_common_schedule->add_arc("end_of_elaboration", "start_of_simulation");
00093         _uvm_common_schedule->add_arc("start_of_simulation", "run");
00094         _uvm_common_schedule->add_arc("run", "extract");
00095         _uvm_common_schedule->add_arc("extract", "check");
00096         _uvm_common_schedule->add_arc("check", "report");
00097         _uvm_common_schedule->add_arc("report", "final");
00098 
00099     }
00100 
00101     return _uvm_common_schedule;
00102 
00103 }
00104 
00105 
00106 uvm_common_schedule* uvm_common_schedule::get_uvm_schedule()
00107 {
00108     uvm_phase* pphase;
00109     uvm_phase* preset_phase;
00110     uvm_phase* pshutdown_phase;
00111     uvm_phase* prun_phase;
00112     uvm_common_schedule* pcommon_schedule;
00113 
00114     if (_uvm_schedule == 0)
00115     {
00116         _uvm_schedule = new uvm_common_schedule("uvm");
00117 
00118         preset_phase = new uvm_common_phase("reset", _uvm_schedule, UVM_RUNTIME_PHASE, UVM_NA);
00119         _uvm_schedule->add_phase(preset_phase);
00120 
00121         pphase = new uvm_common_phase("configure", _uvm_schedule, UVM_RUNTIME_PHASE, UVM_NA);
00122         _uvm_schedule->add_phase(pphase);
00123 
00124         pphase = new uvm_common_phase("main", _uvm_schedule, UVM_RUNTIME_PHASE, UVM_NA);
00125         _uvm_schedule->add_phase(pphase);
00126 
00127         pshutdown_phase = new uvm_common_phase("shutdown", _uvm_schedule, UVM_RUNTIME_PHASE, UVM_NA);
00128         _uvm_schedule->add_phase(pshutdown_phase);
00129 
00130         pcommon_schedule = get_uvm_common_schedule();
00131         prun_phase = pcommon_schedule->get_phase("run");
00132 
00133         preset_phase->sync_phase(prun_phase, UVM_SYNC_AT_START);
00134         pshutdown_phase->sync_phase(prun_phase, UVM_SYNC_AT_END);
00135         prun_phase->sync_phase(pshutdown_phase, UVM_SYNC_AT_END);
00136 
00137         _uvm_schedule->set_top_phase("reset");
00138         _uvm_schedule->add_arc("reset", "configure");
00139         _uvm_schedule->add_arc("configure", "main");
00140         _uvm_schedule->add_arc("main", "shutdown");
00141 
00142     }
00143 
00144     return _uvm_schedule;
00145 
00146 }
